short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix Genre Genie unlocks hidden Netflix categories, helping you can browse genres and discover new favorites with a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix Genre Genie is a Chrome extension designed to unlock Netflix's hidden genres and subcategories adding a new main menu item. With this tool, users can explore Netflix's extensive content library beyond the standard interface. The extension provides a user-friendly way to browse through a wide array of specific themes and genres, from niche interests to highly curated collections. Once you select a hidden category, Netflix Genre Genie redirects you directly to the matching content on Netflix, making it easy to discover new shows and movies tailored to your preferences. It's the perfect companion for expanding your streaming horizons and finding hidden gems effortlessly!
